thread.section_title: BOSS LASER Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BOSS LASER | bosslaser.com
thread.title: Kathy Belleville
thread.title_full: BOSS LASER reviewed by Kathy Belleville

author: Kathy Belleville
title: Kathy Belleville
text: MIchael was professional, courteous, and patient as he trained us. He did a marvelous job of explaining in detail and took time to test each material we would be using to make sure we were comfortable. He inspected and completed adjustments to our machine and took time to teach us how to maintain it. The reason I chose a Boss Laser was because of the excellent customer service and support that they offer. I do not regret my decision at all as I was pleasantly surprised that the service was even better than I read about. This is our first experience with lasers and the Boss Laser Company has made sure I will be successful with it. Thanks again to Michael for making what looked so complicated become comprehendible.
